effect_size: Moderate for 10mg (d=0.58), large for 20mg (d=0.94), very large for 40mg (d=1.28)
notes: Transdermal Cannabidiol Patch for Knee Osteoarthritis: A Dose-Finding RCT
abstract: Dose-response: 10mg (24% reduction), 20mg (38% reduction), 40mg (51% reduction), Placebo (9% reduction); 20mg optimal efficacy-safety ratio
